name: Shootergame (jonastenhoor)
description:
Note: Click fullscreen button (the blue square with white arrows, bottomright). The UI is a bit messy to work with in different resolutions and FS is what the game will run in. Further, I am not experienced in Itch.io resolutions.

Itch.io reads the C# code 'Application.Quit();'(Which when run as an executable closes the game) in a way so the game freezes. This code may happen under two circumstances: Either the player dies, or the player completes wave 2 (last wave in this version)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other files:

Alpha6.rar  - Executable verison(.exe file for windows)

My project_a5.rar - Unity Editor version (a5)
